itemsDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [id: bigint, title: string, category: string, description: string]

distinctCategories: Array[org.apache.spark.sql.Row] = Array([Notebook], [Cloud Provider], [Distribution], [Distributed Cache], [UI], [BI], [Cluster Resource Manager], [Cluster Provision], [Message Broker], [Programming Language], [Streaming], [Distributed Coordinator], [Category], [Search Engine], [Data Processing Execution Engine], [Data Import], [Workflow], [File Format], [Library], [File System], [Database])
distinctCategoriesCount: Long = 21

paragraphs.text:
// Split each document into words
val tokenizer = new RegexTokenizer()
  .setInputCol("description")
  .setOutputCol("words")
  .setGaps(false)
  .setPattern("\\p{L}+")

// Limit to top `vocabSize` most common words and convert to word count vector features
val idf = new IDF()
  .setInputCol(tf.getOutputCol)
  .setOutputCol("idfFeatures")

// Combine IF, IDF, ngram, and Word2Vec
val featureVectorAssembler = new VectorAssembler()
  .setInputCols(Array(idf.getOutputCol))
  .setOutputCol("allFeatures")

// Assign an Index to Each Category 
val categoryIndexerModel = new StringIndexer()
  .setInputCol("category")
  .setOutputCol("indexedCategory")
  .fit(itemsDF)

val pipeline = new Pipeline()
  .setStages(Array(tokenizer, stopWordsFilter, tf, idf, featureVectorAssembler, categoryIndexerModel, classifier, categoryReverseIndexer))

val metricName = "f1"

val modelEvaluator = new MulticlassClassificationEvaluator()
  .setLabelCol(classifier.getLabelCol)
  .setPredictionCol(classifier.getPredictionCol)
  .setMetricName(metricName)

paragraphs.text:
// K-Folds Cross Validation Combined With Param Grid 
val numFolds = 3

val modelValidator = new CrossValidator()
  .setEstimator(pipeline)
  .setEvaluator(modelEvaluator)
  .setEstimatorParamMaps(paramGrid)
  .setNumFolds(numFolds)
